title: Forbidden Fruit
description: When Alexis Phillips, an agent for an underground environmental movement, is sent to protect botanist and inventor Greg Meredith from corporate henchmen, the last thing she expects is trouble maintaining her trademark emotional detachment. But when she gets shot and Greg becomes her protector, her ability to remain aloof is the first thing to go. Throw in the discovery of a shady connection between the corporations that want Greg dead, her employer, and the governmentâ€¦Things are going to get downright messy.Forbidden Fruit is romantic suspense. Approximately 96,000-words.
author: Amanda Bozeman
